meanings.definition: People who do not watch something.
meanings.sent1: The nonviewers missed the exciting movie.
meanings.sent2: There were many nonviewers at the event.
meanings.sent3: The nonviewers decided to have a picnic instead.
meanings.sent4: In a sea of viewers, the nonviewers stood out.
meanings.sent5: The nonviewers were oblivious to the plot twist.

meanings.definition: The act of not watching something.
meanings.sent1: The nonviewers of the play were busy chatting.
meanings.sent2: Nonviewers can choose to engage in other activities.
meanings.sent3: The nonviewers formed a club for book lovers.
meanings.sent5: The nonviewers' absence was noticeable during the show.
